name: QR code Reader & Scanner Pro
description: QR codes are used to reveal more information about a product, service, event or person. Generally,  QRCode reader direct the scanning device to a special URL, video, coupon, event page, email address, or other digital signpost with more details and content.  To scan the QR codes, all you need is a mobile device with QR code Reader & Scanner Pro application.   Function of QRcode Reader & Scanner Pro : - Qrcode application allows user to read the barcode from the camera, read the barcode from an image. Also available in flash light support when reading in low light environment. - QRcode decoding speed is fast, accurate and easy to use. - This is barcode reading software, fast QRcode scanner by camera and photos. - The QRcode software also supports flashlight to help you read Qr code better in low light or night. - Favorite tab: You can save your history and your favorite QR codes as well. Add to favorite function for convenient access to your favorite QR codes.  The application QRcode reader allows you to create barcodes from email, wifi, event, contact, text, website, location, application, telephone, message,...  After creating the QRcode , users can easily share and send to others via email, sms, social networking or other support tools.  When you buy a product, just check the barcode of that product, our software will show you the detailed information about the product you need.  In addition to reading, Qrcode can create different types of Qrcode that allows you to save to photos and share them on social networking sites or share them with friends and relatives quickly and easily. This QR code reader app absolutely exceeded your expectations!
